Source.Name: imwheel
Source.Summary: A tool for tweaking mouse wheel behavior
Source.Description: imwheel is a tool for tweaking mouse wheel behavior, on a per-program basis. It can map mousewheel input to keyboard input, increase mousewheel speed, and has support for modifier keys.

Package.Name: imwheel
Package.Summary: A tool for tweaking mouse wheel behavior
Package.Description: imwheel is a tool for tweaking mouse wheel behavior, on a per-program basis. It can map mousewheel input to keyboard input, increase mousewheel speed, and has support for modifier keys.
